name: Setup
tagline: simple script to install system basics
body:
### setup.sh
setup.sh is a simple bash script, which installs the most important linux programs

### what does it support?
currently, only debian is supported. we are working on porting it to arch and other distros

### is the script finished?
no. we update it everyday

### how do i run it?
download the repository, extract setup.sh and run
    sudo chmod +x setup.sh
now run
    ./setup.sh
### have an idea or found a bug?
please add a new issue to our [repo](https://github.com/september7/setup)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
